paragraph: I was born and raised in a small, but beautiful city, in Mexico, called Queretaro.
After being accepted to New York University Abu Dhabi, I moved to the United Arab Emirates to pursue a bachelor's degree in Computer Science with a minor in Economics.
I'm a Full-Stack Software Developer with three years of professional experience based in Dubai. I have a wide range of project experience building scalable solutions using various technologies.
I'm currently working remotely for Grabbd Inc, a unique mobile platform that allows users to discover new places and create personal city guides.
Some of my other interests include augmented reality, virtual reality, and human-computer interaction.
I'm a quick learner who loves to tackle problems, pitch ideas, and discover new stuff. And whenever I'm not writing code, I enjoy traveling, playing football, and eating food at new places!
